title: GEM Tech Awards 2015 Celebration
desc:
UN Women and ITU, in partnership with the Mayor?s Office of the City of New York, are very happy to invite you to the 2015 Gender Equality and Mainstreaming in Technology (GEM-TECH) Awards! 
 As we approach 2016, we are entering a new era of global commitments around the use of technology for achieving gender equality and women?s empowerment as enshrined in the the Sustainable Development Goals. The GEM-TECH Awards highlight strides that have been made in promoting women in the technology sector, increasing women?s access to and use of technology, and in ensuring that technology is applied to support key dimensions of women?s empowerment. The award winners offer inspiring initiatives and leadership.  
 Come engage with young women technology developers and entrepreneurs in the Tech Showcase during the cocktail reception, hear from eminent leaders such as Mitchell Baker, Executive Chairwoman of Mozilla, and Minerva Tantoco, the CTO of the City of New York, and celebrate the winners of the 2015 GEM-TECH Awards. We look forward to welcoming you there!
